lines.text: John... I'm running out of questions... and you're running out of lies.
You don't know if Tuesdays come in twos or happening once a week.
[last lines]
Is it dark yet?
No. It's getting kinda red...
I remember red.
I suppose I'm drinking myself sober.
We'd better get back to that dump.
No way. I'm not going back.
You might find someone's prick in a hot dog roll.
We're going.
Find yourself a farmer's daughter with nice big fucking tits and shake that bye-bye.
Look at those amazingly bosoms.
You think if she could see she'd hang around with an old dog like you? Your stomach's going around to meet itself behind your back.
Bullshit. I'm in my prime, baby.
Bits.
What do you mean "bits"?
Policeman's bodies age at different rates. Look at me... I got a belly in its 50's, my balls are in their 60's and my feet are in their 80's.
[first lines]
You can drive down there, sir.
I'm already walking. Where is it?
How does anyone, dead as this, loose a knife?
You really are the working part of an asshole, Berlin.
